TopicTitle: Is it possible to copy and paste ship sections?

Articles.Content: I'd like to be able to move ship sections from the SPH to the VAB, or visa-versa.
I would like an option to do that too, but right now as it stands there is no such option.

It is technically possible if you copy/paste the .craft files from your Ships->VAB folder to the Ships-> SPH folder.

I think you could move specific sections if you carefully edit the craft files to keep only what you want.

But the whole point of the 2 different buildings is to differentiate between horizontal and vertical ships.
Wold mak sense to separate the payload from the booster - but right now i do not know such an option.
only if you mean the alt + left click then yes...
